trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una coppia ordinata di coordinate di tipo integer x e y che definisce un punto in un piano bidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: To convert a Point to a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per convertire un punto di un oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> classe da un <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che specifica le coordinate per il nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class using coordinates specified by an integer value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> classe utilizzando coordinate specificate da un valore intero.

trans-unit.source: The low-order 16 bits of the `dw` parameter specify the horizontal x-coordinate and the higher 16 bits specify the vertical y-coordinate for the new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 16 bit meno significativi del `dw` parametro specifica la coordinata orizzontale e i 16 bit superiori specifica la coordinata y verticale per il nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Intero a 32 bit che specifica le coordinate per il nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> classe con le coordinate specificate.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: La posizione orizzontale del punto.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: La posizione verticale del punto.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> specificata <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Add adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'aggiunta di <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Drawing.Size>per il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>i valori del punto specificato.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to add
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> da aggiungere

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that is the result of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta il risultato dell'operazione di aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by rounding the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> per un <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> , arrotondando i valori del <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> di valori integer immediatamente superiori.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> converte questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that has <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> values set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> con <> </> *> e <> </> *> valori impostati su zero.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> contains the same coordinates as the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> contiene le stesse coordinate del <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> specificato

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Da testare.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj is a and has the same coordinates as this .
trans-unit.target: Se obj è un e ha le stesse coordinate di .

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare a seconda di GetHashCode per i valori univoci, come due <xref:System.Drawing.Point>oggetti con gli stessi valori per i relativi <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>proprietà possono restituire lo stesso codice hash.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento potrebbe cambiare nelle versioni future.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che specifica un valore hash per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> è vuoto.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if both <>*> and <>*> are 0; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> dall'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> and `p`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di regolare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>i valori di questo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>alla somma dei valori di <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>i valori di questo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>e `p`.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>
